00020 class DiagnosticsManager{
00021 private:
00022         typedef boost::function<bool (std::string& data, oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Response& response)> command_func_;      
00023         typedef boost::unordered_map<std::string, command_func_> command_map;
00024 public:
00025         DiagnosticsManager(const std::string& name, ros::NodeHandle& nh):
00026                 name_(name),
00027                 nodes_(),
00028                 nh_(nh),
00029                 max_skew_(1.0/250.0){
00030                 //Printout startup information
00031                 ROS_INFO_STREAM("Setting Up Oryx Diagnostics Manager <"<<name<<">...");
00032 
00033                 //Register services/subscribers with ROS
00034                 this->reg_srv_ = this->nh_.advertiseService("oryx/diagnostics/registration", &DiagnosticsManager::regCB, this);
00035                 this->com_srv_ = this->nh_.advertiseService("oryx/diagnostics/commands", &DiagnosticsManager::comCB, this);
00036                 this->hb_sub_  = this->nh_.subscribe("oryx/diagnostics/heartbeat", 10, &DiagnosticsManager::hbCB, this);
00037                 this->soft_stop_pub_ = this->nh_.advertise<oryx_msgs::SoftwareStop>("oryx/software_stop", 2);
00038 
00039                 //Register itself with its node manager
00040                 this->nodes_.registerNode(name,"diagnostics_manager",0,-1,0);
00041 
00042                 //Register valid commands for communication with oryx_diagnostics_client
00043                 this->commands_["node_list"]=boost::bind(&DiagnosticsManager::listCB, this, _1, _2);
00044 
00045                 //Print out the supported command list
00046                 ROS_INFO("Registered Commands...");
00047                 BOOST_FOREACH(command_map::value_type item, this->commands_){
00048                         ROS_INFO("Registered Command: %s", item.first.c_str());
00049                 }
00050 
00051         }
00052         virtual ~DiagnosticsManager(){};
00053 
00054         void printList(){
00055                 std::stringstream output;
00056                 output<<"This is the Node List for Diagnostics Manager <"<<this->name_<<">\n"<<this->nodes_;
00057                 ROS_INFO_STREAM(output.str());
00058         }
00059 
00060         void runDiagnostics(){
00061                 while(ros::ok()){
00062                         NodeManager::result_map results;
00063                         //Get the current time to check against for heartbeat failure
00064                         ros::Time check_time(ros::Time::now());
00065                         //Get the list results of heartbeat check
00066                         this->nodes_.timeCheck(results ,check_time);
00067                         //For each item in the results map...
00068                         BOOST_FOREACH(NodeManager::result_map::value_type item, results){
00069                                 bool failure  = false;
00070                                 bool critical = false;
00071                                 try{
00072                                         //If it failed...
00073                                         if(!item.second.first){
00074                                                 //If it's critical, immediately send out the SoftwareStop message
00075                                                 if(item.second.second==0){
00076                                                         oryx_msgs::SoftwareStop msg;
00077                                                         msg.message = "Critical Node Heartbeat Failure";
00078                                                         msg.stop        = true;
00079                                                         msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00080                                                         msg.header.frame_id = "/robot";
00081                                                         this->soft_stop_pub_.publish(msg);
00082                                                         critical = true;
00083                                                 }
00084                                                 failure = true;
00085                                         }
00086                                 }catch(std::exception& e){
00087                                         ROS_ERROR("Unexpected Error While Checking Heartbeats: %s", e.what());
00088                                 }
00089                                 //If there was a failure, print out some info
00090                                 if(failure||critical){
00091                                         NodeManager::NodeInformationContainer info = this->nodes_.getNode(item.first);
00092                                         //If it was a critical failure, log to ROS_ERROR
00093                                         if(failure&&critical){
00094                                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Critical Node "<<info.getName()<<" Has Failed its Heartbeat Check, Soft-Stop Sent!!!!");
00095                                         }
00096                                         //Otherwise log to ROS_WARN
00097                                         else{
00098                                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Non-Critical Node "<<info.getName()<<" Has Failed its Heartbeat Check!!!!");
00099                                         }
00100                                 }
00101                         }
00102                         ros::spinOnce();
00103                 }
00104         }
00105 
00106 private:
00107         std::string                     name_;
00108         NodeManager                     nodes_;
00109         ros::NodeHandle         nh_;
00110         ros::ServiceServer      reg_srv_;
00111         ros::ServiceServer  com_srv_;
00112         ros::Subscriber         hb_sub_;
00113         ros::Publisher          soft_stop_pub_;
00114         ros::Duration           max_skew_;
00115 
00116 
00117         command_map commands_;                  
00118 
00125         bool regCB(     oryx_msgs::DiagnositicsRegistration::Request& req,
00126                         oryx_msgs::DiagnositicsRegistration::Response& res){
00127                 try{
00128                         res.node_id = this->nodes_.registerNode(req.node_name, req.node_type, req.criticality, req.heartbeat_frequency, req.heartbeat_tolerence);
00129                         res.success = true;
00130                         return true;
00131                 }catch(oryx_diagnostics::NodeManagerException& e){
00132                         res.success = false;
00133                         return false;
00134                 }catch(std::exception& e){
00135                         ROS_ERROR("%s", e.what());
00136                 }
00137                 return false;
00138         }
00139 
00143         void hbCB(const oryx_msgs::HeartbeatConstPtr& msg){
00144                 ros::Duration skew((msg->timestamp-ros::Time::now()));
00145                 if(skew>this->max_skew_){
00146                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Warning, received a heartbeat from <"<<msg->node_id<<"> With a skew of "<<skew<<", greater than max skew of "<<this->max_skew_);
00147                 }
00148                 try{
00149                         this->nodes_.touch(msg->node_id);
00150                 }catch(NoMatchingNodeId& e){
00151                         ROS_ERROR("%s", e.what());
00152                 }catch(std::exception& e){
00153                         ROS_ERROR("Unexpected Error: %s", e.what());
00154                 }
00155         }
00156 
00157 
00164         bool comCB( oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Request& req,
00165                         oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Response& response){
00166                 if(this->commands_.count(req.command)!=1){
00167                         response.success = false;
00168                         response.data = "Invalid Command:" + req.command;
00169                         return true;
00170                 }else{
00171                         return this->commands_[req.command](req.data, response);
00172                 }
00173                 return false;
00174         }
00175 
00183         bool listCB(std::string& data, oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Response& response){
00184                 std::stringstream res_data;
00185                 res_data<<"This is the current node list:\n";
00186                 this->nodes_.printList(res_data);
00187                 response.data = res_data.str();
00188                 response.success = true;
00189                 return true;
00190         }
00191 };

00194 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00195         ros::init(argc, argv, "oryx_diagnostics_manager");
00196         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00197 
00198         nh.setParam("oryx/diagnostics", true);
00199 
00200         DiagnosticsManager manager(ros::this_node::getName(), nh);
00201         manager.printList();
00202         manager.runDiagnostics();
00203         return 1;
00204 
00205 }
